response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us at $1,200,000. Considering its worth and the potential it has to benefit you significantly, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a special price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure that both parties receive substantial benefits. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 950000}
